DOC.brief_summary: This registry help u develop good method : - Preventing cancer - Diagnosing cancer - Treating cancer
DOC.criteria: Kidney Cancer Case Cohort : Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must diagnosis suspicion kidney cancer Family Member Cohort : Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must blood relative proband . Family member probands include mother , father , sister , brother , halfsisters , halfbrothers , daughter , son , grandmother , grandfather , well aunt uncle eligible . These individual need kidney cancer , use segregation analysis suspect variant find proband ; request DNA relative require . Control Cohort : Must ≥ 18 year age AND Must Englishspeaker AND Must personal history cancer , exception nonmelanoma skin cancer , AND Must blood relative case control enrolled study Patients , opinion primary MSKCC clinician investigator , condition precludes ability provide inform consent
